instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: NBC News first announced the decision, and the Romney campaign announced the news to supporters through a phone application at seven a.m., a couple of hours before the official announcement.
output: ຂ່າວທຳອິດຂອງ NBC ແມ່ນໄດ້ຖະແຫຼງກ່ຽວກັບການຕັດສິນໃຈ ແລະ ຕໍ່ມາ ຂະບວນການຕໍ່ຕ້ານຂອງ ທ່ານ ໂຣມນີ ກໍ່ໄດ້ຖະແຫຼງຂ່າວຕ່າງໆໃຫ້ກັບຜູ້ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນໂດຍການສະຫມັກຜ່ານທາງໂທລະສັບຕອນ 7 ໂມງເຊົ້າ ປະມານສອງສາມຊົ່ວໂມງກ່ອນການຖະແຫຼງທີ່ເປັນທາງການ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Alabama Gov. Bob Riley beat back a Republican primary challenge from Roy Moore, the former judge who tried to put up a Ten Commandments monument in his courthouse.
output: ລັດຖະບານທ້ອງຖິ່ນ ອາລາບາມາ ທ່ານ ບອັບ ໄລລີ ໄດ້ຕອບໂຕ້ຄືນ ການທ້າທາຍຈາກ ທ່ານ ລອຍ ມໍ ຝ່າຍສາທາລະນະລັດ ອະດີດ ຜູ້ພິພາກສາ ທີ່ເຄີຍພະຍາຍາມຕັ້ງອານຸສາວະລີ ບົດບັນຍັດ ສິບປະການ ໃນສານຂອງລາວ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: In Port Coquitlam, a retaining wall burst, throwing concrete and rubble tens of metres and covering an arterial road with mud to a depth of two metres.
output: ໃນເມືອງພອດ ໂຄຄຸດລັມ ກໍາແພງກັ້ນດິນໄດ້ແຕກອອກ ມີຊີມັງ ແລະ ຊາກຫັກພັງໄຫລ່ອອກໄກຫລາຍກວ່າ 10 ແມັດ ແລະ ປົກຄຸມເອົາຫົນທາງໃຫຍ່ ດ້ວຍຂີ້ຕົມ ເລີກຮອດ 2 ແມັດ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Owners of the coal mine have been detained by local police and the investigation into the cause of the flooding is underway.
output: ເຈົ້າຂອງເຫມືອງຖ່ານຫິນຖືກຄຸມຂັງໂດຍຕຳຫລວດທ້ອງຖິ່ນແລະການສອບສວນສາເຫດທີ່ເກີດນ້ຳຖ້ວມຍັງຄົງຢູ່ໃນຂະບວນການດໍາເນີນ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: This comes amidst disputes over the Preah Vihear temple complex which spans both countries.
output: ຊື່ງເກີດຂື້ນໃນລະຫວ່າງການໂຕ້ແຍ້ງເລື່ອງເຂົາພະວິຫານຊື່ງຄອບຄຸມທັງສອງປະເທດ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Argentina extended their lead further after the break with a third penalty from Felipe Contepomi and a drop goal from Juan Martín Hernández.
output: ອາເຈນຕິນ່າຍິ່ງເຮັດຄະແນນຫລາຍຂື້ນ ຫລັງພັກຄິ່ງ ເມື່ອຟິລິເປ ຄອນເທໂປມີຍິງຈຸດໂທດລູກທີສາມ ແລະຄວນມາຕິນ ເຮີນັນເດເຕະເຮັດຄະແນນໄດ້.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: NYMEX Crude closed at $91.86, while ICE Brent closed at $88.69, at the conclusion of Friday's trading.
output: NYMEX Crude ໄດ້ປິດທີ່ $91.86 ຂະນະທີ່ ICE Brent ໄດ້ປິດໃນລາຄາ $88.69 ໃນບົດສະຫຼຸບການຂາຍຂອງວັນສຸກ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Boehner and Reid also agreed to a bipartisan negotiation committee to sort out differences and extend the tax cut for an entire year, a goal recently sought by Republicans in the House.
output: ໂບເນີແລະເຣດຍັງເຫັນດີກັບການເຈລະຈາລະຫວ່າງຄະນະກຳມະການຂອງສອງພັກທີ່ຈະພິຈາລະນາຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງແລະຂະຫຍາຍການລົດພາສີທັງປີ ຊື່ງເປັນເປົ້າຫມາຍທີ່ສະມາຊິກພັກລິພັບບິກັນຂອງສະພາໄດ້ສະແຫວງຫາເມື່ອບໍ່ດົນມານີ້.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Among those with doubts are the Foreign Secretary Margaret Beckett, Hilary Benn, Minister of State for International Development, and Peter Hain, Secretary of State for Wales and Northern Ireland.
output: ຂໍ້ສົງໄສດັ່ງກ່າວແມ່ນມາຈາກ ທ່ານ ມາກາເລັດ ເບັກເກດ ລັດຖະມົນຕີວ່າການກະຊວງການຕ່າງປະເທດ ທ່ານ ຮິນລາຣີ ເບັນ ລັດຖະມົນຕີວ່າການກະຊວງການພັດທະນາລະຫວ່າງປະເທດ ແລະ ທ່ານ ປີເຕີ ເຮັນ ລັດຖະມົນຕີວ່າການກະຊວງການຕ່າງປະເທດແຫ່ງລັດເວວ ແລະ ໄອແລນເໜືອ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The six-month study found Australia has more uranium than was previously thought.
output: ການສຶກສາຫົກເດືອນ ພົບວ່າ ອົດສະຕາລີມີ ແຮ່ທາດ ຢູເລນຽມ ຫຼາຍກ່ວາທີ່ເຄີຍໄດ້ປະເມີນໄວ້.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Interstate 80 is closed in Cedar County, Iowa, east of the Iowa City area, due to flooding from the Iowa River and Coralville Lake.
output: ທາງຫຼວງ 80 ປິດໃຊ້ໃນ ເຊດາ ຄຸນຕີ ອີໂອວາ ທາງຕາເວັນອອກຂອງເຂດຕົວເມືອງ ອີໂອວາ ເນື່ອງຈາກເກີດນໍ້າຖ້ວມຈາກແມ່ນອີໂອວາ ແລະ ທະເລສາບໂຄລໍວິວ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Mr. Gibbs, who has worked for the Obama administration for two years, left in February 2011, and was reportedly "relaxing" and had denied rumors that he was planning to campaign for chairman of the Democratic National Committee if Tim Kaine were to leave the committee to run for a position in the senate.
output: ທ່ານ ກິບສ ຜູ້ທີ່ໄດ້ເຄີຍເຮັດວຽກ ບໍລິຫານໃຫ້ ທ່ານ ໂອບາມາ ເປັນເວລາ ສອງປີ ໄດ້ອອກຈາກງານ ໃນເດືອນ ກຸມພາ ປີ 2011 ແລະຖືກລາຍງານວ່າ "ກໍາລັງຜ່ອນຄາຍ" ແລະ ໄດ້ປະຕິເສດຕໍ່ຂ່າວລື ກ່ຽວກັບ ເລື່ອງທີ່ທ່ານໄດ້ກໍາລັງວາງແຜນການເຮັດການລົນນະລົງຫາສຽງ ສໍາລັບຕໍາແໜ່ງປະທານ ຄະນະກໍາມະການປະຊາທິປະໄຕແຫ່ງຊາດ ຖ້າຫາກວ່າທ່ານ ທິມ ເກນ ຈະອອກຈາກຄະນະ ເພື່ອ ໄປຮັບຕໍາແໜ່ງໃນວຸດທິສະພາ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: In the intervening election, the victorious Conservatives promised that if they were elected parliament would hold a free vote on whether to amend or repeal the Act.
output: ໃນການເລືອກຕັ້ງ ພັກອານຸລັກນິຍົມທີ່ຊະນະການເລືອກຕັ້ງໄດ້ໃຫ້ສັນຍາວ່າ ຫາກພວກເຂົາໄດ້ຮັບເລືອກ ທາງສະພາຈະສາມາດລົງຄະແນນໄດ້ຢ່າງເສລີງ່າຈະແກ້ໄຂຫລືຍົກເລີກພະລາດຊະບັນຫຍັດດັ່ງກ່າວ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: In total, € 2.2 million was supposedly diverted from the marine's purchasing services using false invoices.
output: ໂດຍລວມ ເງີນກວ່າ €2.2 ລ້ານຖືກບິດເບືອນຈາກໃບແຈ້ງຍອດປອມໃນການຊື້ທາງທະເລ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The Institute for Geophysics has lost an important part of its equipment installed on the slopes of Tungurahua, limiting their capability to monitor the volcanic activity.
output: ສະຖາບັນທໍລະນີຟີຊິກສາດໄດ້ເສຍອຸປະກອນສ່ວນສຳຄັນທີ່ຕິດຕັ້ງເທິງເນີນພູຂອງພູໄຟຕັງກູລາຮົວທີ່ຈຳກັດສະມັດຖະພາບການເຄື່ອນໄຫວຂອງພູເຂົາໄຟໃຫ້ນ້ອຍລົງ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: A Tesoro-owned refinery was involved in another fire in 2002, also with no reported injuries.
output: ເຈົ້າຂອງ ໂຮງງານກັ່ນນ້ຳມັນ Tesoro ຖືກກ່ຽວໃນໄຟໄໝ້ບ່ອນອື່ນໃນປີ 2002 ທີ່ບໍ່ໄດ້ລາຍງານວ່າມີໃຜບາດເຈັບ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The kidnappers have threatened to kill three of the tuna trawler's crew after a stand-off with Spanish forces.
output: ຜູ້ລັກພາໂຕໄດ້​ຂູ່​ວ່າ​ຈະ​ຂ້າ​ລູກ​ເຮືອ​ສາມ​ຄົນ​ຂອງລູກເຮືອ trawler tuna ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ທີ່​ປະ​ຈໍາ​ໄປ​ກັບ​ກໍາ​ລັງ​ສະ​ເປນ​.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: With the grand finale of the cooking competition already scheduled for that time, and expected to attract around four million viewers, the decision has been made to move the debate forward to 1830 and shorten it to 60 minutes.
output: ດ້ວຍຕອນຈົບທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ຂອງການແຂ່ງຂັນແຕ່ງອາຫານທີ່ມີກໍານົດແຂ່ງຂັນໃນເວລາດັ່ງກ່າວ ແລະ ຄາດວ່າຈະດຶງດູດຜູ້ຊົມປະມານ 4 ລ້ານຄົນ ການຕັດສິນໃຈທີ່ຈະຍ້າຍການໂຕ້ວາທີ່ໄປເວລາ 1830 ໂມງ ແລະ ຕັດເວລາເປັນ 60​ ນາທີ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The airlines believe the merger will save $530 million annually.
output: ສາຍການບິນເຊື່ອວ່າຄວບກິດຈະການນີ້ຈະຊ່ວຍປະຫຍັດລາຍຈ່າຍໄດ້ຖືງ 530 ລ້ານໂດລາຕໍ່ປີ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: "If the two satellites hit head-on, rather than a glancing blow, the energy of the collision would completely disintegrate both satellites into clouds of debris," said the UCS in a statement on their website who also added that the collision took place in "the same region of space where China destroyed a defunct Chinese weather satellite with an anti-satellite (ASAT) weapon" in 2007.
output: "ຖ້າວ່າສອງດາວທຽມປະທະກັນເຊິ່ງໜ໊າພະລັງງານຂອງການຕຳຈະເຮັດໃຫ້ທັງສອງດາວທຽມແຕກສະຫຼາຍກາຍເປັນໝອກຄັວນ ແທນທີ່ທີ່ມັນຈະລະເບີດ" ກ່າວໂດຍ UCS ໃນຖະແຫຼງການເທິງເວບໄຊຂອງພວກເຂົາເຊິ່ງຍັງໄດ້ກ່າວຕື່ມອີກວ່າການປະທະກັນໄດ້ເກີດຂຶ້ນໃນ "ພື້ນທີ່ດຽວກັນກັບບ່ອນທີຈີນທຳລາຍດາວທຽມພະຍາກອນອາກາດເກົ່າດ້ວຍອາວຸດທຸຳລາຍດາວທຽມ(ASAT)" ໃນປີ 2007.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The RCMP have advised people to stay home and off the highway.
output: ພາກສ່ວນ RCMP ໄດ້ແນະນໍາໃຫ້ປະຊາຊົນ ຢູ່ແຕ່ເຮືອນ ແລະ ຫ່າງຈາກ ທາງຫຼວງ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The owner, manager, and an investor of the mine were taken into police custody on Monday.
output: ເຈົ້າຂອງໂຄງການ ຫົວໜ້າໂຄງການ ແລະ ນັກລົງທຶນ ຂອງບໍແຮ່ດັ່ງກ່າວ ຖືກຈັບຕົວເຂົ້າຫ້ອງຂັງໃນວັນຈັນ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Then, thanks to the improved flexibility of the market, it should be simpler to find a job.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Robert Kubica got a drive through the pit-lane penalty after some dangerous driving and a collision with Hamilton, causing the Polish driver to be rolled back to 7th place.
output: ໂຣເບີດ ຄູບິກາ ຕ້ອງຂັບໄປຍັງເລນສຳຫລັບນັກແຂ່ງທີ່ຖືກເຮັດໂທດເນື່ອງຈາກການຂັບທີ່ອັນຕະລາຍ ແລະການຕໍາກັບແຮມມິວຕັນ ເຮັດໃຫ້ນັກຂັບຈາກໂປແລນຕ້ອງຕົກລົງໄປຢູ່ລໍາດັບທີ 7.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: A feasibility study will now be conducted, with construction scheduled to start next year.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The merchant ship was en-route from Brazil to Yemen with a cargo of sugar.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: It is believed that the fire was started by an electrical fault, the Xinhua news agency reports.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Our foreign policy is focused on supporting the people of those countries in their desire to live in a democracy just as we enjoy in the UK."

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Financial experts believe that next year, the deficit will reach over $700 billion, while the National Debt Clock has recently run out of digits to record over $10 trillion in national debt.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Microprocessor company Intel Corporation has quit the board of directors for the One Laptop Per Child association (OLPC), a non-profit organization that aims to provide children in developing countries with inexpensive laptops.
output: ບໍລິສັດໄມໂຄໂປເຊດເຊີອິນເທວ ຄໍໂປເລຊັ້ນໄດ້ອອກຈາກຄະນະກຳມະການ ເພື່ອເຮັດວຽກທີ່ສະຫນາມແລ໊ບທ໊ອບຫນື່ງເຄື່ອງຕໍ່ເດັກນ້ອຍຫນື່ງຄົນ (ໂອແອວພີຊີ) ຊື່ງເປັນອົງການບໍ່ສະແຫວງຫາກຳໄລຊື່ງມີເປົ້າຫມາຍໃນການໃຫ້ເດັກນ້ອຍໃນປະເທດກຳລັງພັດທະນາມີແລ໊ບທ໊ອບທີ່ບໍ່ແພງ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The ship's 18-man crew are said to be "very happy" with developments.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Investors were said to have been worried about developing in the country citing lack of security and legal protection.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: "Their arguments will be heard with respect in Khartoum, since they cannot be said to be founded on any kind of cultural imperialism, or to be actuated by Islamophobia."
output: "ການຕົກລົງຂອງພວກເຂົາຈະຖືກໄດ້ຍິນດ້ວຍຄວາມນັບຖື ທີ່ກາຕຸມ Khartoum ເພາະພວກເຂົາບໍ່ສາມເວົ້າໄດ້ວ່າຖືກພົບໃນແງ່ ຂອງວັດທະນະທຳລັດທິຈັກກະພັດນິຍົມແຕ່ຢ່າງໃດ ຫຼື ຖືກກະຕຸ້ນໃຫ້ກະທຳໂດຍຄວາມຢ້ານກົວຕໍ່ສາສະໜາອິສະລາມ."

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The victory earned Johnson 190 points (including a 5 point bonus), moving him closer to point leader Kevin Harvick, but he is still 105 points behind in second position.
output: ໄຊຊະນະດັ່ງກ່າວເຮັດໃຫ້ ຈອນສັນ ມີ 190 ຄະແນນ (ລວມທັງ ຄະແນນພິເສດ 5ຄະແນນ) ເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວຈາກຍ້າຍລຳດັບທີ່ໃກ້ກັບຜູ້ນໍາ ເຄວິນ ຮາຣ໌ວິກ ຫຼາຍຂື້ນ ແຕ່ລາວກໍ່ຍັງມີແຕ່ 105 ຄະແນນ ເຊິ່ງຢູ່ຫຼັງອັນດັບສອງ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: This only added up to a 9 household share for the hour, compared to an 11 share for Law & Order: Criminal Intent on NBC, a 14 share for a CBS Hallmark Hall of Fame movie of the week (traditionally only aired during the key sweeps periods), and a 23 share for the aforementioned Desperate Housewives.
output: ກໍ່ຈະນັບວ່າມີສ່ວນແບ່ງຕະຫລາດຄົນເບິ່ງພຽງແຕ່ 9 ຄົວເຮືອນໃນຊົ່ວໂມງນັ້ນ ປຽບທຽບກັບ 11ສ່ວນແບ່ງສຳຫລັບ ລໍແອນ ອໍເດີ: ຄຣີມິນັດ ອິນເທນ ໃນສະຖານນີ ເອັນບີຊີ 14ສ່ວນແບ່ງ ສຳຫລັບ ຫນັງປະຈຳອາທິດ ຊີບີເອັດສ໌ ອໍມາກ ຮໍ ອອບ ເຟມ(ຕາມປົກກະຕິຈະສາຍແຕ່ຊ່ວງທີ່ສຳຄັນໃນການກວາດຄົນເບິ່ງ) ແລະ 23ສ່ວນສຳຫລັບລາຍການເດດເພເຣດ ເຮົາ ໄວ ດັ່ງທີ່ໄດ້ກ່າວມາແລ້ວ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Before the success of his first film, Corneau attempted to make a documentary about New York and an adaptation of a novel.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The ammunition was supplied by the Miami-based AEY Inc., a company run by a 22-year old named Efrain Diveroli.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: At the time of his death, Bustos was with his wife and five of his seven children, who were deeply upset by the death.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The Swedish Navy have released a picture regarding a foreign submarine discovered in the Saltsjöbaden river of Lake Mälaren in Stockholm, the capital city of Sweden, situated on the western coast of the Baltic Sea.
output: ກອງທັບເຮືອສະວີເດັນ ໄດ້ປ່ອຍຮູບກ່ຽວກັບເຮືອດຳນໍ້າຕ່າງປະເທດທີ່ຖືກຄົ້ນພົບໃນແມ່ນໍ້າ ຊອນໂຈບາເດັນ ທີ່ເມືອງເລກ ມາລາເຣັນ ທີ່ ສະຕອກໂຮມ ເມືອງຫຼວງຂອງປະເທດສະວີເດັນ ເຊິ່ງຕັ້ງຢູ່ຝັັ່ງຕະເວັນຕົກຂອງທະເລ ບາລຕິກ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: After questions and answers finished, the video statement from John Kerry began to play.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The US embassy released a statement saying that attacking civilian workers will not lessen US support for the Afghan people and their election process.
output: ສະ​ຖານ​ທູດ​ສະ​ຫະ​ລັດ​ອອກ​ຖະ​ແຫຼງກ​ານ​ວ່າ ການ​ໂຈມ​ຕີ​ພົນ​ລະ​ເຮືອນ​ ບໍ່​ອາດ​ຈະ​ລົດ​ລະ​ຄວາມ​ພະ​ຍາ​ຍາມ​ຂອງ​ສະ​ຫະ​ລັດ​ໄດ້​ໃນ​ການ​ສະ​ໜັບ​ສະ​ໜູນ​ປະ​ຊາ​ຊົນ​ຊາວ​ອາ​ຟະກາ​ນິດສະ​ຖານ ແລະ​ຂ​ະ​ບວນ​ການ​ເລືອກ​ຕັ້ງ​ຂອງ​ພວກ​ເຂົາ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: The fire fighters were met with laughter and sarcastic applause.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: He has now called for a thorough debate and examination of the issue.
output: ຕອນນີ້ລາວໄດ້ຂໍໃຫ້ເປີດອະພິປາຍແລະພິຈາລະນາປະເດັນນີ້ຢ່າງລະອຽດ.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Lao (Laotian) language.
input: Piniella's announcement came after the Chicago Cubs lost to the Atlanta Braves 16-5 at the Cub's Wrigley Field.
output: ການປະກາດຂອງພິເນລ່າມີຂື້ນຫລັງຈາກຊິຄາໂກຄັບເສຍໃຫ້ກັບແອດແລນຕ້າ ເບັບ ດ້ວຍຄະແນນ 16-5 ທີ່ສະຫນາມຣິກລີ່ຂອງທີມຄັບ.
